name: Familiar (howmironic)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Press space and play with headphones.

DESCRIPTION:

As Gamers, we go through a lot of dialogue. Designers have tried to make this interaction more interesting by adding things like decision making. But these additions are not present every time we engage with textual information in a game.

This game is an attempt to look at how we can make interactivity a part of every dialogue interaction.

NOTE:

If you are Deaf or hard of hearing, and you want more out of this sound based experience, please message me and I will  construct an equivalent (if not better!) experience for you.
